class.name: FormatEntity
class.comment: Table to store the FeatureOfInterestType information. Mapping file: sos/core/FeatureType.hbm.xml

column.name: format_id
column.comment: Table primary key, used for relations

column.name: definition
column.comment: The format definitions, e.g. http://www.opengis.net/def/samplingFeatureType/OGC-OM/2.0/SF_SamplingPoint (OGC OM 2.0 specification) for point features, http://www.opengis.net/def/observationType/OGC-OM/2.0/OM_Measurement (OGC OM 2.0 specification) for OM_Measurement, http://www.opengis.net/sensorML/1.0.1 for procedures descriptions as specified in OGC SensorML 1.0.1
